rules_text:
When Expedition Outfitter enters, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
At the beginning of each end step, if an artifact was put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn, Expedition Outfitter deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: [i]“The gears change as often as the season.”[/i]
notes: A Detailed And Poetic Physical Threat To The Person Who Intentionally Vandalized My 1994 Dodge Intrepid Behind Kate's Apartment — Pet Symmetry
